name: Berry hunt in a bad dimension
name_original: Berry hunt in a bad dimension
description:
A game made for the Weekly Game Jam 49: Explore the Abyss.

Berry hunt in a bad dimension

You are helplessly lost in a strange dimension! A badly made dimension on further inspection as well. There is a door that gives hope that there is a way out, but it needs... berries? to open? Luckily you got a direction stick to help you find them all.

Q - Locks/unlocks the camera.
Hold Right Mouse Button - Inspect objects in the world.
Left Click - Interact with some objects.
Clicking the icons at the top - Gain information where to go.

This has to be one of the worst games I have ever made. I'm just happy it's over. Learned quite a few things from this project at-least. Like making games with a single focus. Anyway, I hope you enjoy it for what it is.
